messages.content: I am a quote generating machine. Generate 5 quotes by {name}. No hashtags, no emojis and no name.
Generate quotes inspired by the philosopher {name}.

I am a philosphy text generating machine. Generate 5 texts about {topic}. Each text should have around 200-250 characters, never exceed 250 characters and consist of 2-3 sentences. Format each with a leading number, for example: "1. text". The word "{topic}" should be randomly scattered inside the texts.
